title: Find the Mushroom Picker
content:
us, telling herself that "It's going to be ok", and asking the adventurer "What did you do?". She refuses any attempts to help her leave Baelen. Give it to Shadowheart to unlock some of her repressed memories.

You can extort Derryth for an additional reward for the Noblestalk through an intimidation check even though she says she has nothing to give. She awards you a non-magic wedding ring that sells for about 115gp and then seems to not like you afterward. You also have the option to keep both
